channel.title: git on Josh Errickson
channel.description: Recent content in git on Josh Errickson

item.title: Exclude files from git commands
item.description: To exclude files from git commands such as git grep or git diff: 1 2 git grep foobar -- ':!*.java' git diff -- ':!*.html' ':!abc.csv' Works for whole folders as well.

item.title: Ignore whitespace on Git diffs
item.description: By default, git’s diff (git diff or on Github) show whitespace changes as well as meaningful changes. To suppress them in git diff, add the -b flag: git diff -b To suppress on github.com, append ?w=1 to any diff’s URL.
